content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the klaipeda district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property the court dismissed the part of the proceedings related to the division of an apartment and awarded compensation based on the parties withdrawal of their claims on the apartment the court assigned a volkswagen golf car as the personal property of the applicant and a hyundai terracan car as the personal property of the defendant the court also declared that the applicant has a personal obligation to repay a credit agreement the text explains various articles related to matrimonial property the applicant has applied to the court to dissolve their marriage and has made several requests including retaining their surname establishing a place of residence for their children and ordering the defendant to pay child maintenance the court found that the marriage has been dissolved and decided to divide the matrimonial property the court awarded the applicant a volkswagen golf car and the defendant a hyundai terracan car the court also addressed a claim for compensation made by the defendant and ordered the applicant to pay half of the compensation amount the court considered the financial situation of both parties and postponed the payment of the compensation for six months the court also decided that each party should bear their own costs the court partially upheld the amended application counterclaim in a divorce case resulting in the dissolution of the marriage due to fault on both spouses
